description: This file contains test cases for the 'Agent' class and related functionalities, specifically testing external execution flows involving tools with external execution requirements, including synchronous and asynchronous scenarios, multiple tools, and error handling.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_external_execution
methods.description: Tests that the agent correctly handles a tool requiring external execution, verifying the pause state and tool arguments.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_external_execution_stream
methods.description: Tests external execution with streaming responses, ensuring the agent pauses appropriately and handles continuation.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_external_execution_async
methods.description: Asynchronous test for external execution, verifying pause state and continuation handling.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_external_execution_error
methods.description: Tests that the agent raises an error if continuation is attempted without confirming external execution.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_external_execution_stream_async
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for external execution, verifying pause and continuation.

methods.name: test_tool_call_multiple_requires_external_execution
methods.description: Tests handling multiple tools requiring external execution, verifying correct tool selection and response handling.
